products.name: Premium Coldpress Mustard Oil
products.shortDescription: Pure, traditional coldpressed mustard oil from Bihar's finest mustard seeds.
products.longDescription: Our premium coldpressed mustard oil is extracted using traditional methods that preserve all the natural nutrients and authentic flavor. Made from carefully selected mustard seeds grown in the fertile plains of Bihar, this oil is perfect for cooking, massage, and traditional Ayurvedic treatments. Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, vitamin E, and natural antioxidants.

seo.title: Premium Coldpress Mustard Oil 500ml - KishansKraft | Pure Bihar Mustard Oil
seo.description: Buy pure coldpressed mustard oil from Bihar. Traditional extraction, rich in omega-3, perfect for cooking and massage. Premium quality mustard seeds from Madhubani.

reviews.name: Priya Singh
reviews.comment: Excellent quality! The taste and aroma remind me of my grandmother's homemade oil. Perfect for traditional Bengali cooking.

reviews.name: Rajesh Kumar
reviews.comment: Best mustard oil I've used in years. Pure and authentic. Great for both cooking and hair massage.

products.storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight

products.name: Premium Coldpress Mustard Oil - 1L
products.shortDescription: Larger pack of our premium coldpressed mustard oil, perfect for families.
products.longDescription: Our 1-liter pack of premium coldpressed mustard oil offers great value for families who appreciate authentic flavors and traditional quality. This oil maintains all the nutritional benefits and purity of our traditional extraction process, making it ideal for daily cooking needs and wellness routines.

seo.title: Premium Coldpress Mustard Oil 1L - KishansKraft | Family Pack Bihar Mustard Oil
seo.description: Buy 1L premium coldpressed mustard oil from Bihar. Family pack size, traditional extraction, rich in omega-3. Best value for authentic mustard oil.

reviews.name: Anita Devi
reviews.comment: Perfect size for our family. The quality is consistent and the oil has that authentic taste we love.

products.storageInstructions: Store in cool, dry place away from direct sunlight
